alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 2:01PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Santa Clara County through 230 PM PDT... At 201 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morgan Hill, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, times of heavy rain, and pea size hail possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan Hill and San Martin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
